title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: For your consideration are four magical Kialara pieces produced in 2015:LOT 1: 2015 Signature Series Ricky Allman "Excavatorelevator 1" #204/500LOT 2: 2015 Signature Series Ricky Allman "Excavatorelevator 2" #204/250LOT 3: 2015 Signature Series Ricky Allman "Excavatorelevator 3" #084/100LOT 4: 2015 Labyrinth 0.1BTC #539/2500 silver balls**Each bar comes with original foam slipcase with label and also the plastic cases made by Kialara**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0002BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 6th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on October 02, 2022, 06:56:16 AMlot4 is unloaded, isn't it?You can see the tag still attached in the pic, so I would assume it's not loaded.I don't think many people load a Kialara since you basically have to destroy the piece to redeem
